column1: The funeral service  will be Thursday
column3: 2015 at 2:00 P.M. at Mt. Olive Baptist Church (North) with Reverends L. C. Harris and Jason Watkins officiating. Burial with military honors will follow in the adjoining cemetery.  The family will receive friends at Benefield Funeral Home in Lineville on Wednesday
column5: 2015 from 5:30 P.M. until 8:00 P.M. and until 12:15 P.M. on Thursday. He will lie in state at the church for one hour prior to service time.
